attributes.action: Stop the sale of the student loan book.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As some will now no doubt be aware of the chancellors recent headline grabbing budget, there will be a selling off of assets. This is includes the Student Loan book being sold to raise 6 Billion in the short term. This cannot happen as it will then allow the private companies to charge commercial rates and therefore chase individuals if the debt becomes "delinquent". This cannot happen, students have been done over one to many times and we must make a stand!
